gcci.text: H100 supply stabilizes as US-East availability improves, unlocking next-wave capex for scaled cluster expansions.

gtpi.text: API price wars intensify as distilled models compress inference costs, driving sharp token-price deflation.

gagl.text: AI load pushes grids to strain; nuclear baseload is becoming essential for new GW-scale clusters.

aipi.text: Consolidation signals maturing fundamentals, but valuations still warrant vigilance against bubble risks.
